Record.ClassificationPath: Nervous System Diseases/Central Nervous System Diseases/Movement Disorders/Dyskinesias/Chorea/Neuroacanthocytosis
Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities/Genetic Diseases, Inborn/Heredodegenerative Disorders, Nervous System/Neuroacanthocytosis
Record.BroaderTerm: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
Record.Description: An inherited autosomal disorder that is characterized by neurodegeneration; orofacial and buccal DYSKINESIAS; CHOREA; and thorny-looking red cells (ACANTHOCYTES). This disorder is due to mutations of chorein which is important in protein trafficking and is encoded by Vps13a on chromosome 9q21.
